price: Je! Mtaachwa salama usalimina katika haya yaliyopo hapa?
footnotes: Lilio wazuia ni kule kuamini kwao kwamba ati wataselelea katika zile starehe, watasalimika na adhabu, na kutoweka, na mauti,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
